column4: is anyone else having problems with ipkungfu on edgy? After installing it it spits back a bunch of error messages. the first two are nearly the same.... "/usr/sbin/ipkungfu: 6: source: not found"
the file it is trying to source at that line is /etc/ipkungfu/pre.conf which is there...
i think there maybe still an ipkungfu irc room..the guy that wrote it...is usually just hanging out
